name: The Words In Your Mouth: Janky GDC Demo
name_original: The Words In Your Mouth: Janky GDC Demo
description:
Get ready for 5-10 minutes of surprise janky last-minute demo action. It's a work in progress, what's here isn't necessarily final, etc.

Also, it crashes on Firefox but works in Chrome, I guess? I'll try to get it fixed soon, but I can't promise anything.

If you want to leave feedback, feel free.

CONTROLS:

Spacebar or Left Click to interact. Right Click to reset the puzzle.
Remember that your line can only end if it's blocked.
